newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: SolidBank sets one-for-seven rights offer.
newsitem.headline: SolidBank sets one-for-seven rights offer.

text.p: SolidBank Corp said on Tuesday its board had approved a one-for-seven stock rights offering to raise 511 million pesos.
Corporate secretary Romulo Bernardez told the Securities and Exchange Commission that it would offer 2.920 million shares at 175 pesos per share. SolidBank shares closed at 410 pesos on Tuesday.
The targeted record date is set for April 8 and the offer period will start on April 10 and run until April 30.
"The proceeds of the offering will be used primarily to support growth in risk assets, branch expansion/renovation and automation," Bernardez said.
SolidBank is an affiliate of Bank of Nova Scotia.
